message: Hi Alex, thanks for coming in. I see you did a lot of research work during your PhD. Can you tell me, in simple words, what kind of work you were doing day to day?
Yes, I work with data and numbers. I try make computer learn from data. I run many code, test many time, and try make things faster and more correct.
When you say you made things faster, what exactly were you improving, and how did you know it was working better than before?
Before it take very long time to run, like hours. I change how code run and use many computer together. After that, it run much quicker. I check time and also check result still same or better.
